==Descriptions==
{{Description|Legend has it that in the depths of the desert, an ancient god tried to recreate the underworld and the heavens, so that sinners would fall into the underworld and the ones favored by him would live in paradise.|Viewpoint, [[Viewpoint/The Bottomless Hall|The Bottomless Hall]]}}

==Trivia==
* Falling into the void at the bottom will respawn the player at the entrance without any HP or energy penalty.
{{Dialogue start}}
::'''Paimon:''' Watch out! Don't go near there!
{{Dialogue end}}
===Etymology===
* The {{Lang|''{{w|Duat}}''|egy=dwꜣt}} is the realm of the dead in ancient Egyptian mythology.
